pages.text: The jack herer Strain$(br2)Base THC: 18% $(br)Base CBD: 7% $(br)Effect: R Trees
jack herer Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
jack herer Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
jack herer Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting jack herer Weed in an Extractor
You can package your jack herer weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
